content.raw:
OK this is interesting… I reverted to `_useIgnition=false` \(as documentation indicates\), and tried manually executing a service call within one of the solution docker containers \(robot names are X2N1 and X2N2 - executing within the X2N1 container\):

`rosservice call X2N1 X2N2 X2N1 1234 10 test`

After making that service call, communication starts working correctly between the two robots! Strangely enough, this is very repeatable. 

This may be a way to work around the issue, but I’m really curious what would be going on here.
